title: Ambuja Neotia Group announces acquisition of Tree of Life Resorts & Hotels
description: Kolkata's Ambuja Neotia Group has acquired Gurugram's Tree of Life Resorts & Hotels, a boutique hotel chain with 14 locations across India. This strategic move bolsters Ambuja Neotia Group's presence in the hospitality sector, adding 200 keys to its existing portfolio of over 750 keys managed by global brands like IHCL.
